text: @ryanstruyk https://t.co/uVGzMfxU4F… Virginia Governor Northham’s Health Dept prohibits use of Hydroxycholoquine for most Coronavirus patients even when Dr and patient agree it could allow outpatient recovery. Why? Hint: Northam has a KKK picture on his personal medical school yearbook page
